title: SmartSafeHQ
author: SmartSafeHQ
content: Hello everyone,I'm thrilled to introduce SmartSafe, the newest platform to manage digital assets on Ethereum and multiple EVMs. Our user-friendly crypto storage is designed with safety in mind for individuals, DAOs, investors, and more.SmartSafe utilizes all concepts of Account Abstraction and offers multi-sig signatures, automatic transfers, and other features to ensure your assets are secure. We're currently in private beta testing, and all early adopters and testers will be eligible for an airdrop of our very own token, $SAFU.Our mission is to provide a safe and user-friendly environment for managing digital assets. We believe that our platform is unique and innovative, and we're excited to hear your thoughts on it.To stay up-to-date with our progress and learn more about SmartSafe, please follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/SmartSafeHQ and join our Discord community: https://discord.gg/TTreuxXyzd. You can also visit our website at https://www.smartsafe.finance/.Thank you for your interest, and we look forward to connecting with you all soon!
